tools.name: egfr_epi
tools.description:
Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate (eGFR) using the EPI formula (version 2021)
    Reference: N Engl J Med. 2021 Nov 4;385(19):1737-1749
    
    Parameters:
    -----------
    scr : float
        serum creatinine level in mg/dL
    age : int
        Age in years
    male : bool
        true if Male
    
    Returns:
    --------
    float
        Estimated GFR in mL/min/1.73m^2
